name: Submerged (itch) (Zirk Coetsee)
description:
How to Open:

  • Download Build 1.zip
  • Extract Build 1.zip
  • Run Project Boost.exe

How to play: 

  • Space Bar to activate submarine engine 
  • A and D to rotate submarine 
  • Escape to Exit Game 
  • Follow the direction line to reach the green destination 
  • Avoid hitting the cave walls 
  • Avoid hitting the moving fish 

Levels: 1 - 4 Levels
